job_posting.title: Software Engineer, Large Scale Pre-Training Performance
job_posting.description:
About the job
Snapshot

We are seeking a software engineer to define, drive, and critically contribute to the next generation of the state-of-the-art ML models on TPU. As part of the Pre-Training team you will co-design the model, and implement critical components across Model architecture, ML frameworks, custom kernels and platform, to deliver frontier models with maximum efficiency.

About Us

Artificial Intelligence could be one of humanity’s most useful inventions. At Google DeepMind, we’re a team of scientists, engineers, machine learning experts and more, working together to advance the state of the art in artificial intelligence. We use our technologies for widespread public benefit and scientific discovery, and collaborate with others on critical challenges, ensuring safety and ethics are the highest priority.

The Role

We’re looking for a Software Engineer to re-define efficient training of frontier LLMs at massive scale. This role offers an opportunity to influence the design of frontier LLM models, and drive an effort to ensure efficient training and inference.

Key responsibilities:

Being responsible for Pre-Training efficiency and optimising the performance of the latest models on Google’s fleet of hardware accelerators - throughout the entire LLM research, training and deployment lifecycle. 
Being responsible for guiding model design to ensure inference-efficiency. 
Greatly improving the performance of LLM models on hardware accelerators by optimizing at all levels, including developing custom kernels when necessary. 
Collaborating with the compiler, framework, and platform teams. And ensure efficient training at industry-largest scale. 
Profile models to identify performance bottlenecks and opportunities for optimization. 
Develop low-level custom kernels for maximum performance of the most critical operators. 
Collaborating with research teams by enabling new critical operators in advance of their availability in frameworks and compilers. 

About You

You're an engineer looking to re-define efficient training of frontier LLMs at massive scale and have:

A proven track record of critical contributions to the distributed training of LLMs at 1e25 FLOPs scale on modern GPU/TPU clusters 
Experience in programming hardware accelerators GPU/TPUs via ML frameworks (e.g. JAX, PyTorch) and low-level programming models (e.g. CUDA, OpenCL) 
Experience in leveraging custom kernels and compiler infrastructure to improve performance on hardware 
Experience with Python and neural network training (publications, open-source projects, relevant work experience, etc.) 

The US base salary range for this full-time position is between $235,000 - $350,000 + bonus + equity + benefits. Your recruiter can share more about the specific salary range for your targeted location during the hiring process.

Application deadline: March 12, 2025

Note: In the event your application is successful and an offer of employment is made to you, any offer of employment will be conditional on the results of a background check, performed by a third party acting on our behalf. For more information on how we handle your data, please see our Applicant and Candidate Privacy Policyopen_in_new.

At Google DeepMind, we value diversity of experience, knowledge, backgrounds and perspectives and harness these qualities to create extraordinary impact. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, race, religion or belief, ethnic or national origin, disability, age, citizenship, marital, domestic or civil partnership status, sexual orientation, gender identity, pregnancy, or related condition (including breastfeeding) or any other basis as protected by applicable law. If you have a disability or additional need that requires accommodation, please do not hesitate to let us know.

candidates.summary: Neethu is a passionate Data Scientist dedicated to unravelling the narratives hidden within data. With a Master's degree in Data Science from Lancaster University and proficiency in Python, SQL, and machine learning, she excels at merging data insights with strategic business goals. Throughout her career, Neethu has orchestrated complex data strategies, led stakeholder engagements, and developed automated dashboards to drive informed decisions. Her expertise spans regression, classification, clustering, and more, enabling her to uncover actionable patterns and trends that propel organisational success. Beyond her professional pursuits, she finds inspiration in music and art—singing and drawing serve as her creative outlets. In all her endeavours, whether crafting predictive models or creating art, she brings creativity, curiosity, and a commitment to excellence.

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: At Career Connect, I focus on analyzing data to develop predictive models that assess the risk of young individuals becoming NEET (Not in Education, Employment, or Training). By examining historical trends and key factors such as demographics, education, and socio-economic conditions, I identify patterns that inform early intervention strategies to reduce NEET rates and promote youth engagement. My role involves collaborating with teams to collect and refine data, ensuring that analyses are accurate and actionable. The insights I generate support evidence-based policy-making and program design. Additionally, I streamline reporting processes, build dashboards, and provide strategic insights to advance Career Connect's mission. Through data-driven analytics, I aim to enhance educational, employment, and training outcomes, helping young people achieve long-term success.
achievements: Developed predictive models to assess NEET risk
Streamlined reporting processes
Built dashboards for strategic insights
Supported evidence-based policy-making

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: I've played a pivotal role in revolutionising healthcare services through data-driven insights and innovative solutions. From aggregating and structuring complex datasets to developing predictive models for attendance forecasting, my journey as a Data Science Intern at LCC has been marked by a relentless pursuit of efficiency and excellence. Leveraging advanced analytics tools like Python and Power BI, I've unearthed actionable insights that have not only optimised NHS health check services but also empowered decision-makers with invaluable information. My collaborative spirit and effective communication have fostered a dynamic team environment, where sharing insights and ideas is paramount to success. My passion for making a tangible impact in healthcare, combined with a diverse skill set encompassing data analysis, predictive modelling, and visualisation, continues to drive me towards shaping a brighter future for healthcare delivery.
achievements: Developed predictive models for attendance forecasting
Optimised NHS health check services
Aggregated and structured complex healthcare datasets

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: My role at Evoke Frames encompasses a diverse array of responsibilities crucial to the company's growth and client acquisition. Key highlights include building strong client relationships, developing sales and marketing strategies, identifying and mitigating business risks, and utilising data insights for informed decision-making. By leveraging tools like Google Analytics and Meta Business Suite, I've spearheaded web analysis and implemented SEO-focused content strategies, resulting in significant reductions in bounce rates and notable sales increases. My multifaceted contributions at the intersection of client relations, data analysis, and strategic decision-making have been instrumental in elevating Evoke Frame's market presence and driving substantial growth.
achievements: Significant reductions in bounce rates
Notable sales increases
Implemented SEO-focused content strategies
Elevated company's market presence

candidates.summary: I have effectively assisted clients worldwide in meeting their business and technical objectives through implementation of data science solutions. My expertise is in leveraging artificial intelligence, and I hold a Master's degree in Computer Science with specialization in AI from University of Leeds. Currently, I am applying my skills and knowledge as a member of the TradeTeq team, actively contributing to the company's success.

candidates.summary: Data Scientist with seven (7) years of experience and advanced expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence. Versatile professional with demonstrated success applying data science solutions across diverse sectors including education, health care, cybersecurity, and agriculture. Combines technical proficiency in programming with strong analytical thinking and leadership capabilities. Experienced AI instructor with the ability to communicate complex concepts effectively. Committed to leveraging data-driven insights to solve challenging business problems and drive innovation.

experience.title: AI Instructor
experience.description: Remote position teaching AI and deep learning courses
achievements: Developed and delivered comprehensive curriculum on the foundations of deep learning, providing students with both theoretical knowledge and practical implementation skills
Designed specialized course on applying deep learning techniques to sequential data analysis, covering RNNs, LSTMs, and transformers with real-world applications
Created and taught advanced computer vision course, focusing on convolutional neural networks, object detection, and image segmentation techniques
Mentored students through complex AI projects, providing code reviews and implementation guidance
Maintained high student satisfaction ratings through engaging teaching methods and accessible explanations of complex technical concepts

experience.title: Data Science Consultant
experience.description: Remote consulting position focused on agricultural AI solutions
achievements: Led a specialized team focused on developing AI models for early detection of Red Palm Weevil infestations, a critical agricultural pest
Designed and built computer vision models that achieved 94% accuracy in identifying plant diseases from image data
Created custom deep learning algorithms to detect subtle signs of pest damage before visible symptoms appeared
Collaborated with agronomists to refine model parameters based on field expertise and regional agricultural patterns
Established standardized methodologies for data collection and preparation, improving model training efficiency by 40%

experience.title: Statistician / Data Scientist
experience.description: Data science and statistical analysis role in Doha, Qatar
achievements: Architected and implemented a comprehensive data entry system that streamlined information collection and improved data integrity
Developed advanced natural language processing solutions for automated document analysis and information extraction
Created and deployed document classification algorithms
Conducted statistical analysis on large datasets to identify patterns and generate actionable insights for organizational decision-making
Delivered training programs on statistical methods and data analysis techniques to colleagues

certifications: Professional Certificate in Data Science, edX (2019)
projects: Soil Nutrient Optimization System — Developed machine learning models to predict optimal nutrient composition based on crop type, soil condition, and climate data
Water Quality Monitoring Network — Created real-time anomaly detection system for irrigation water quality using sensor data and time series analysis, identifying contaminants with 94% accuracy
Crop Disease Prediction Model — Designed deep learning system to identify early signs of plant diseases from multispectral imagery
Microclimate Mapping for Precision Agriculture — Built spatial analysis model combining satellite imagery, ground sensors, and topographical data to enable field-specific planting recommendations
Sustainable Irrigation AI System — Developed reinforcement learning algorithm to optimize irrigation scheduling based on weather forecasts, soil moisture, and plant growth stages
